node.detail_zh: 患者與丈夫及兒子同住於秀茂坪曉暉閣曉麗苑。她於 2 月 10 日開始出現發燒及咳，同日及 14 日曾到私家診所求醫。  她於油塘大本營一粥麵任職收銀員，她於 2 月 10 日最後上班，之前一直有戴口罩。她後來在聯合醫院確診。
node.detail_en: The patient lives in Hiu Lai Court, Sau Mau Ping with her son and husband. She started showing symptoms of respiratory infection on Feb 10, and went to a private clinic for treatement on Feb 10 and 14. She works as a cashier at Super Super Congee & Noodle, Domain Mall, Yau Tong. Feb 10 was her last working day, before which she had worn masks (to work). She was diagnosed with coronavirus at Union Christian Hospital subsequently.

node.remarks_zh: 2 月 10 日出現發燒和咳嗽，同日向一名私家醫生求醫，2 月 14 日再向同一名私家醫生求醫。
node.remarks_en: She developed cough and fever on Feb 10 and consulted a private doctor on the same day. She consulted the same private doctor on Feb 14.

node.location_en: Hiu Lai Court, Block D, Hiu Fai House
node.remarks_zh: 患者與丈夫及兒子同住，她於 2 月 10 日發燒及咳。
node.remarks_en: Patient lives with her husband and son, and developed fever and cough on Feb 10.

node.location_en: Super Super Congee & Noodle, Domain Mall, 38 Ko Chiu Road
node.remarks_zh: 2 月 10 日為最後工作日，一直有戴口罩。防護中心正向食肆跟進其他員工情況。
node.remarks_en: Last working date was Feb 10, she was wearing mask at work. Center of Health Protection is following up with the restaurant on other staff's condition.

node.remarks_zh: 於 2 月 19 日入住聯合醫院，2 月 20 日確診。
node.remarks_en: Tested positive for novel coronavirus on Feb 20.
